purpose: To provide a user-friendly interface for designing and managing AI workflows using a node-based system
principle: Built on PySide6 and Qt for a graphical interface, integrating with CrewAI for workflow automation
reusability: Designed to be extensible with plugins, allowing integration with various AI models and workflows
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have incomplete features and potential stability issues
name: CrewAI-GUI-Qt
description: A Node-Based Frontend for CrewAI: Revolutionizing AI Workflow Creation
highlight: Node-based GUI for creating AI workflows with CrewAI integration
